# mw_isNumber

**Source:** `src/public_html/res/js/main.js`

---

## Description

Checks whether a value is numeric (can be parsed to a finite Number).

## Signature

function mw_isNumber(n)

- n: any — value to evaluate

## Returns

- boolean — true when `parseFloat(n)` is a number and is finite

## Example

mw_isNumber('3.14') // -> true
mw_isNumber('abc') // -> false
